title: Mckinsey’s Bradley: We’re in a New Economic Era
description: Chris Bradley, McKinsey Global Institute Director and Senior Partner, says we are entering a new economic era. He speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Chris Bradley, McKinsey Global Institute Director and Senior Partner, says we are entering a new economic era. He speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
